description: Lucy Lee was the first to try a new machine based on the Jetaime, The Hatchet. She fucked it so hard she was making the machine bounce all over the pool table (it weighs 30 pounds), and managed to bend a compression joint to where the dildo got caught between arm and motor, ripping it - with her pussy! We have a second new machine for you this week, The Chopper, which Lucy rides with maximum enjoyment.
title: Lucy Lee
